name: bklit-analytics
title: Bklit Analytics
description: This extension allows you to see your analytics daily digest both in your menu bar and in a snapshot view.
author: uixmat

commands.name: top-countries-menubar
commands.title: Bklit Menu Bar
commands.subtitle: Bklit Analytics
commands.description: Shows top countries from the last 24 hours in your menu bar

commands.name: snapshot
commands.title: Show Analytics Snapshot
commands.subtitle: Bklit Analytics
commands.description: View your analytics snapshot for the last 24 hours

preferences.name: apiToken
preferences.title: API Token
preferences.description: Your Bklit API token (create one in Settings > API Tokens)

preferences.name: projectId
preferences.title: Project ID
preferences.description: The project ID you want to track (find in project settings)

preferences.name: dashboardUrl
preferences.title: Dashboard URL
preferences.description: Custom dashboard URL (leave blank for production)

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
